question.title: Build failed in Flutter project after cloning to new device – Unknown Kotlin JVM target: 21
question.body:
I recently cloned my Flutter project to a new machine. The project was working without issues before, but after trying to run it on the new device, I’m getting the following error during build:

FAILURE: Build failed with an exception.

* What went wrong:
Could not determine the dependencies of task ':flutter_image_compress_common:compileDebugKotlin'.
> Unknown Kotlin JVM target: 21

⚠️ Project context

The error seems to be caused by the dependency:

flutter_image_compress: ^2.1.0

My app/build.gradle file contains the following relevant configuration:

plugins {
    id "com.android.application"
    id "kotlin-android"
    id "dev.flutter.flutter-gradle-plugin"
}

android {
    namespace "com.app.application"
    compileSdkVersion flutter.compileSdkVersion
    ndkVersion flutter.ndkVersion

    compileOptions {
        sourceCompatibility JavaVersion.VERSION_1_8
        targetCompatibility JavaVersion.VERSION_1_8
    }

    kotlinOptions {
        jvmTarget = '17'
    }

    defaultConfig {
        applicationId "com.app"
        minSdkVersion 21
        targetSdkVersion flutter.targetSdkVersion
        versionCode flutterVersionCode.toInteger()
        versionName flutterVersionName
    }
}

flutter {
    source '../..'
}
